de.k3b.util

Class StringTemplateEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.k3b.util.StringTemplateEngine

  • public class StringTemplateEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Engine that replaces all occurences of ${name} with corresponding values from callback.
    new StringTemplate(valueResolver).format("hello ${first.name}!") will produce "hello world!" if valueResolver.get("first","name") returns "world" becomes "hello world!" Created by k3b on 01.04.2015.
